name: Ice Pick [3]
description: The mobster has been in trouble lately because other professional adventurers always misunderstand that they are fighting with screwdrivers

name: Ice Powder
description: Mysterious Ice Magic. It will exhale cold powders, so please be careful in case of congelation.

name: Ice Resist Alloy
description: Reduces ice damage by 50% for 5min. Cannot work with Fire/Hurricane/Earth Alloy effects.

name: Icy Brand
effect: Water Dmg ＋10%,Every 15 seconds, set enemies in a 2-meter range into frozen state

name: Idol's Support Drink·Blue
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. INT ＋ 10, Magic Dam ＋20%, For 30 min. (The effect cannot be stacked with Int food)

name: Idol's Support Drink·Brown
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. VIT ＋ 10, MaxHP ＋ 1000, effect lasts 30 minutes. (Can't be stacked with VIT Food)

name: Idol's Support Drink·Green
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. DEX ＋ 10, LongRange Dam ＋20%, For 30 min. (The effect cannot be stacked with Dex food)

name: Idol's Support Drink·Pink
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. AGI ＋ 10, Attack Spd ＋20%, For 30 min. (The effect cannot be stacked with Agi food)

name: Idol's Support Drink·Red
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. STR ＋ 10, Melee Dam ＋20%, For 30 min. (The effect cannot be stacked with food STR)

name: Idol's Support Drink·Yellow
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. LUK ＋ 10, Cri ＋20, For 30 min. (The effect cannot be stacked with lucky food)

name: Ignus Steel [1]
description: The giant Two-Handed Axe is said to be made by a blacksmith living in a volcano and is said to be boiling-hot.

name: Ignus Steel [2]
description: The giant Two-Handed Axe is said to be made by a blacksmith living in a volcano and is said to be boiling-hot.

name: Immaterial Sword[2]
description: A formless sword with Psychokinesis Attributes. It can disturb the mind of the enemy.

name: Immaterial Sword[3]
description: A formless sword with Psychokinesis Attributes. It can disturb the mind of the enemy.
